description: React component for a Loyalty Program webpage section, featuring benefits showcase, promotions, and a signup form with validation and simulated submission.

methods.name: validateForm
methods.description: Validates the loyalty signup form fields for correctness, returning an object containing error messages for invalid fields.

methods.name: handleInputChange
methods.description: Updates membership data state when user types in input fields, and clears error messages for the specific field.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles the form submission asynchronously, simulating an API call, managing success or error status, and resetting form on success.

methods.name: toggleSignupForm
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the signup form and resets related states.
